price: 92 Or, il ne sied pas au Tout Miséricordieux de se donner un enfant.
arabic: وَمَا يَنۢبَغِي لِلرَّحۡمَٰنِ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā yanbaghī lilrraḥmāni an yattakhidha waladan
